<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 11"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Quill of Passage](/Equipment.aspx?ID=881)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [PFS Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=50) pg. 117</row>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) All characters have access to this item_

**Price** 1,200 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

</row>

**Access** Member of the Pathfinder Society.

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This black-feathered quill has a glowing nib with a small amount of glowing ink inside it.

<column gap="tiny">
